author: Meagan Flynn
title: Trump’s old friend Piers Morgan watches briefings ‘with mounting horror,' urges president to stop ‘self-aggrandizing’ - The Washington Post
description:
1. Trump’s old friend Piers Morgan watches briefings ‘with mounting horror,' urges president to stop ‘self-aggrandizing’  The Washington Post
  2. Piers Morgan Blasts 'Friend' Trump's Virus Response: 'Failing the American People'  The Daily Beast <…
content:
The whirlwind news conferences were becoming almost like a rally to him almost like whats more important is winning the election in November, Morgan said.
No its not, Donald Trump. What is more important right now is saving American lives, he said.
